0.name: Maya Switch Mode
0.keymaps_string: ["Object Mode", "Mesh", "Curve", "Armature", "Metaball", "Lattice", "Pose", "Weight Paint", "Vertex Paint", "Sculpt", "Particle", "Font", "Grease Pencil", "Curves", "Paint Vertex Selection (Weight, Vertex)", "Paint Face Mask (Weight, Vertex, Texture)", "Sculpt Curves", "User Interface", "UV Editor", "Image Paint"]

11.name: If have access to edit mode
11.poll_string: (C.object and C.object.type == "MESH") or (C.object and C.object.type == "CURVE") or (C.object and C.object.type == "FONT") or (C.object and C.object.type == "GPENCIL") or (C.object and C.object.type == "ARMATURE") or (C.object and C.object.type == "LATTICE") or (C.object and C.object.type == "CURVES") or (C.object and C.object.type == "META") or (C.object and C.object.type == "SURFACE")

0.description: Use right click to switch mode
